abstract: This sport utility vehicle has many advantages, including a third row, but at almost $50,000, it’s an expensive way to save gas.
snippet: This sport utility vehicle has many advantages, including a third row, but at almost $50,000, it’s an expensive way to save gas.
lead_paragraph: A LONG weekend will tell you something about a vehicle. Thorough assessment requires adding a bunch of teenage boys and their athletic gear, carting everything 500 miles and amassing a landfill’s worth of fast-food wrappers. To get my son and his two friends from Seattle to an Ultimate Frisbee tournament in Corvallis, Ore., I took Toyota’s Highlander Hybrid.

headline.main: Video Review: Toyota Highlander Hybrid Offers Room and Fuel Economy
headline.print_headline: Toyota Highlander Hybrid Offers Room and Fuel Economy
